title: Time piece
brief_description: Combines comedy and serious commentary to show one person’s life in the urban rat race. Portrays the hero, a typical young executive, as he is hospitalised and his daily life tasks flash before his eyes, alternating between realism and wild dreams. Starring Jim Henson and Enid Cafritz. Animated by Jim Henson.
